content.description: Let f(x)=e2x . Let R be the region in the first quadrant bounded by the graph of y=f(x) and the vertical line x=1 , as shown in the figure above.
content.question: Find the area of R.

topic.text: 8.4: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of x

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
